channel.title: NavigationBars on Vast Mistery
channel.description: Recent content in NavigationBars on Vast Mistery

item.description: Hello World Here are someways to embed Plotly images Json Json works with some short-codes. However the slider is not working. Plotly.d3.json("/plotly/test.json", function(err, fig) { Plotly.plot('\/plotly\/test.json', fig.data, fig.layout, {responsive: true}); }); Html The html version of plotly is exported with CDN. The slider works! However, when the plot is too big it sometimes refused to show up. First try: (With slider) window.

Tableau plots Here we used Tableau Public var divElement = document.getElementById('viz1620689576250'); var vizElement = divElement.getElementsByTagName('object')[0]; vizElement.style.width='100%';vizElement.style.height=(divElement.offsetWidth*0.75)+'px'; var scriptElement = document.createElement('script'); scriptElement.src = 'https://public.tableau.com/javascripts/api/viz_v1.js'; vizElement.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptElement, vizElement); --
